member.summary: Block Controller - This service is responsible for getting arguments in network blocks.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.summary: Gets all blocks.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: T:Service.Controllers.DefaultValuesController
member.summary: This service returns all the modules and their default values. If any module doesnt have any default values, then only the attributes are returned.

member.name: M:Service.Controllers.DefaultValuesController.#ctor(Business.RequestHandlers.Interfaces.IDefaultValueManager)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: interface of the 'backend' manager which does all the work.

member.name: M:Service.Controllers.DefaultValuesController.GetAllDefaultValues(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Gets default values for all the modules.
member.returns: A representing the result of the operation.

member.name: T:Service.Controllers.DeviceTypeController
member.summary: This service returns the device information.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.summary: Gets all devices.

member.name: M:Service.Controllers.DeviceTypeController.GetAllFirmwareVersions
member.summary: Gets the current firmware versions from github repository.
member.returns: status code representing the result of the operation and the result.

member.name: T:Service.Controllers.ModuleController

member.summary: Gets all modules.

member.summary: Get the module information by name.
member.returns: A representing the result of the operation.

member.summary: Gets the list of modules by names.
member.returns: A representing the result of the operation.
